annotations.description: IBM VPC with VPN, Bastion servers, and OpenShift

variables.name: ibmcloud_api_key
variables.description: The IBM Cloud api key

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the resource group

variables.description: Value used to order the provisioning of the resource group

outputs.description: The name of the resource group

outputs.name: group
outputs.description: The resource group object

outputs.description: Value used to order the provisioning of the resource group

outputs.description: Flag indicating that the resource group was provisioned by this module

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: Resource group where the cluster has been provisioned.

variables.description: Geographic location of the resource (e.g. us-south, us-east)

variables.name: tags
variables.description: Tags that should be applied to the service

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: The prefix name for the service. If not provided it will default to the resource group name

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag indicating that key-protect instance should be provisioned

variables.name: name
variables.description: The name that should be used for the service, particularly when connecting to an existing service. If not provided then the name will be defaulted to {name prefix}-{service}

variables.name: private_endpoint
variables.description: Flag indicating that the service should be created with private endpoints

variables.name: number_of_crypto_units
variables.description: No of crypto units that has to be attached to the instance.

variables.name: service
variables.description: The name of the KMS provider that should be used (keyprotect or hpcs)

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the IBM Cloud resource group where the VPC instance will be created.

variables.name: region
variables.description: The IBM Cloud region where the cluster will be/has been installed.

variables.name: name
variables.description: The name of the vpc instance

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: The name of the vpc resource

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag indicating that the instance should be provisioned. If false then an existing instance will be looked up

variables.name: address_prefix_count
variables.description: The number of ipv4_cidr_blocks

variables.name: address_prefixes
variables.description: List of ipv4 cidr blocks for the address prefixes (e.g. ['10.10.10.0/24']). If you are providing cidr blocks then a value must be provided for each of the subnets. If you don't provide cidr blocks for each of the subnets then values will be generated using the {ipv4_address_count} value.

variables.name: base_security_group_name
variables.description: The name of the base security group. If not provided the name will be based on the vpc name

variables.name: internal_cidr
variables.description: The cidr range of the internal network

variables.name: tags
variables.description: Tags that should be added to the instance

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: The name of the vpc instance

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: The id of the vpc instance

outputs.name: acl_id
outputs.description: The id of the network acl

outputs.name: crn
outputs.description: The CRN for the vpc instance

outputs.name: count
outputs.description: The number of VPCs created by this module. Always set to 1

outputs.name: names
outputs.description: The name of the vpc instance

outputs.name: ids
outputs.description: The id of the vpc instance

outputs.name: base_security_group
outputs.description: The id of the base security group to be shared by other resources. The base group is different from the default security group.

outputs.name: addresses
outputs.description: The ip address ranges for the VPC

variables.name: resource_group_id
variables.description: The id of the IBM Cloud resource group where the VPC gateways will be created.

variables.name: region
variables.description: The IBM Cloud region where the cluster will be/has been installed.

variables.name: vpc_name
variables.description: The name of the vpc instance

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag indicating that the gateway must be provisioned

variables.name: tags
variables.description: Tags that should be added to the instance

outputs.name: count
outputs.description: The number of gateways created

outputs.name: gateway_ids
outputs.description: List of ids of the gateways created

outputs.name: gateways
outputs.description: List of ids and zones of gateways created

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: The Object Storage instance id

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: The Object Storage instance name

outputs.name: crn
outputs.description: The crn of the Object Storage instance

outputs.name: location
outputs.description: The Object Storage instance location

outputs.name: key_name
outputs.description: The name of the credential provisioned for the Object Storage instance

outputs.description: The name of the credential provisioned for the Object Storage instance

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag indicating that the key should be provisioned. If false then an existing key will be looked up

variables.name: kms_id
variables.description: The id of the kms instance. Required if kms_enabled is true

variables.name: kms_public_url
variables.description: The public url of the kms instance. Required if kms_enabled is true

variables.name: kms_private_url
variables.description: The private url of the kms instance. Required if kms_enabled is true

variables.name: name
variables.description: The name of the root key in the kms instance. Required if kms_enabled is true

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: The name_prefix used to build the name if one is not provided. If used the name will be `{name_prefix}-{label}`

variables.name: label
variables.description: The label used to build the name if one is not provided. If used the name will be `{name_prefix}-{label}`

variables.name: rotation_interval
variables.description: The interval in months that a root key needs to be rotated.

variables.name: dual_auth_delete
variables.description: Flag indicating that the key requires dual authorization to be deleted.

variables.name: force_delete
variables.description: Flag indicating that 'force' should be applied to key on delete

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: The id of the key

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: The crn of the key

outputs.name: crn
outputs.description: The crn of the key

outputs.name: kms_id
outputs.description: The id of the kms instance

outputs.name: kms_public_url
outputs.description: The public url of the kms instance

outputs.name: kms_private_url
outputs.description: The private url of the kms instance

variables.name: region

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: The prefix name for the service. If not provided it will default to the resource group name

variables.name: plan
variables.description: The type of plan the service instance should run under (lite, 7-day, 14-day, or 30-day)

variables.name: tags
variables.description: Tags that should be applied to the service

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag indicating that logdna instance should be provisioned

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: The id of the provisioned instance.

outputs.name: guid

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the IBM Cloud resource group where the VPC has been provisioned.

variables.name: region
variables.description: The IBM Cloud region where the cluster will be/has been installed.

variables.name: vpc_name
variables.description: The name of the vpc instance

variables.name: zone_offset
variables.description: The offset for the zone where the subnet should be created. The default offset is 0 which means the first subnet should be created in zone xxx-1

variables.name: _count
variables.description: The number of subnets that should be provisioned

variables.name: label
variables.description: Label for the subnets created

variables.name: gateways
variables.description: List of gateway ids and zones

variables.name: ipv4_cidr_blocks
variables.description: List of ipv4 cidr blocks for the subnets that will be created (e.g. ['10.10.10.0/24']). If you are providing cidr blocks then a value must be provided for each of the subnets. If you don't provide cidr blocks for each of the subnets then values will be generated using the {ipv4_address_count} value.

variables.name: ipv4_address_count
variables.description: The size of the ipv4 cidr block that should be allocated to the subnet. If {ipv4_cidr_blocks} are provided then this value is ignored.

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag indicating that the subnet should be provisioned. If 'false' then the subnet will be looked up.

variables.name: acl_rules
variables.description: List of rules to set on the subnet access control list

variables.name: tags
variables.description: Tags that should be added to the instance

outputs.name: count
outputs.description: The number of subnets created

outputs.name: ids
outputs.description: The ids of the created subnets

outputs.name: names
outputs.description: The ids of the created subnets

outputs.name: subnets
outputs.description: The subnets that were created

outputs.name: acl_id
outputs.description: The id of the network acl for the subnets

outputs.name: vpc_name
outputs.description: The name of the VPC where the subnets were provisioned

outputs.name: vpc_id
outputs.description: The id of the VPC where the subnets were provisioned

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the IBM Cloud resource group where the cluster will be created/can be found.

variables.name: region
variables.description: The IBM Cloud region where the cluster will be/has been installed.

variables.name: ibmcloud_api_key
variables.description: The IBM Cloud api token

variables.name: name
variables.description: The name of the cluster that will be created within the resource group

variables.name: worker_count
variables.description: The number of worker nodes that should be provisioned for classic infrastructure

variables.name: flavor
variables.description: The machine type that will be provisioned for classic infrastructure

variables.name: ocp_version
variables.description: The version of the OpenShift cluster that should be provisioned (format 4.x)

variables.name: exists
variables.description: Flag indicating if the cluster already exists (true or false)

variables.name: disable_public_endpoint
variables.description: Flag indicating that the public endpoint should be disabled

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: The prefix name for the service. If not provided it will default to the resource group name

variables.name: ocp_entitlement
variables.description: Value that is applied to the entitlements for OCP cluster provisioning

variables.name: force_delete_storage
variables.description: Attribute to force the removal of persistent storage associtated with the cluster

variables.name: tags
variables.description: Tags that should be added to the instance

variables.name: vpc_name
variables.description: Name of the VPC instance that will be used

variables.name: vpc_subnet_count
variables.description: Number of vpc subnets

variables.name: vpc_subnets
variables.description: List of subnets with labels

variables.name: cos_id
variables.description: The crn of the COS instance that will be used with the OCP instance

variables.name: kms_enabled
variables.description: Flag indicating that kms encryption should be enabled for this cluster

variables.name: kms_id
variables.description: The crn of the KMS instance that will be used to encrypt the cluster.

variables.name: kms_key_id
variables.description: The id of the root key in the KMS instance that will be used to encrypt the cluster.

variables.name: kms_private_endpoint
variables.description: Flag indicating that the private endpoint should be used to connect the KMS system to the cluster.

variables.name: login
variables.description: Flag indicating that after the cluster is provisioned, the module should log into the cluster

variables.name: sync
variables.description: Value used to order dependencies

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: ID of the cluster.

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: Name of the cluster.

outputs.name: resource_group_name
outputs.description: Name of the resource group containing the cluster.

outputs.name: region
outputs.description: Region containing the cluster.

outputs.name: config_file_path
outputs.description: Path to the config file for the cluster.

outputs.name: platform
outputs.description: Configuration values for the cluster platform

outputs.name: sync
outputs.description: Value used to sync downstream modules

outputs.name: total_worker_count
outputs.description: The total number of workers for the cluster. (subnets * number of workers)

outputs.name: workers
outputs.description: List of objects containing data for all workers

outputs.name: server_url
outputs.description: The url used to connect to the api server. If the cluster has public endpoints enabled this will be the public api server, otherwise this will be the private api server url

outputs.name: username
outputs.description: The username of the admin user for the cluster

outputs.name: password
outputs.description: The password of the admin user for the cluster

outputs.name: token
outputs.description: The admin user token used to generate the cluster

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: Existing resource group where the IKS cluster will be provisioned.

variables.name: region
variables.description: Geographic location of the resource (e.g. us-south, us-east)

variables.name: ibmcloud_api_key
variables.description: The apikey used to access the IBM Cloud account

variables.name: logdna_id
variables.description: The id of the logdna instance that will be gound to the cluster

variables.name: cluster_name
variables.description: The name of the cluster

variables.name: cluster_id
variables.description: The identifier for the cluster

variables.name: private_endpoint
variables.description: Flag indicating that the agent should be created with private endpoints

variables.name: sync
variables.description: Semaphore to synchronize activities between modules

variables.name: namespace

variables.name: vpc_subnet_count
variables.description: Number of vpc subnets

variables.name: vpc_subnets
variables.description: List of subnets with labels

variables.name: resource_label
variables.description: The label for the resource to which the vpe will be connected. Used as a tag and as part of the vpe name.

variables.name: resource_crn
variables.description: The crn of the resource to which the vpe will be connected.

variables.name: resource_service
variables.description: The endpoint gateway target resource type. Values can be provider_cloud_service, provider_infrastructure_service, ?.

variables.name: sync
variables.description: Value used to synchronize dependencies between modules

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: The id of the created VPE gateway
